titleStmt.title: A character of popery and arbitrary government with a timely caveat and advice to all the freeholders, citizens and burgesses, how they may prevent the same by choosing good members to serve in this new Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Philolaus, fl. 1681.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York, and Harvard University Libraries.
